That IMDB link is wrong. The film is directed by Brett Hanover. 

Here's the updated Wikipedia link (wonder how long it'll last): http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Bridge_%28film%29

I understand what the film maker was trying to do but I think that it falls a bit flat and isn't actually that informative. If you want to know more you would do better spending twenty minutes looking at http://www.scientology.org/ with your sceptic hat on and then checking out http://www.xenu.net/ for the more honest opposing view.
